price: Nsεnkyerεnee pefee ne Nwoma (na Yεde somaa asomafoͻ no), εna Yɛasane Afutusεm no de ama woͻ, sεdeε wobεkyerεkyerε deε yɛasane ama wͻn no mu pefee akyerε wͻn sεdeε wͻbɛnya adwen.
arabic: بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِۗ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bil-bayināti wal-zuburi wa-anzalnā ilayka al-dhik'ra litubayyina lilnnāsi mā nuzzila ilayhim walaʿallahum yatafakkarūna
